title: Authors and Citation
text: Last F (2024). weatheR: Package (One Line, Title Case). R package version 0.0.0.9000.
code: @Manual{,   title = {weatheR: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)},   author = {First Last},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000}, }

title: c_ombrothermic_diagram — c_ombrothermic_diagram
text: Plot ombrothermic diagram set weather data. y scale, one temperature unit equals two rain unit. correct, 30 years must selected statistical analysis.

title: c_ombrothermic_diagram — c_ombrothermic_diagram
text: data Dataframe columns date, rain, T_air_max T_air_min respectively date day, rain (mm) maximum minimum temperature (°C). year_start Start year begin statical analysis. year_end End year finish statical analysis. source Source data.

title: c_ombrothermic_diagram — c_ombrothermic_diagram
text: List table diagram. table used build ombrothermic plot.

title: c_ombrothermic_diagram — c_ombrothermic_diagram
code: output <- c_ombrothermic_diagram(data = weather_blue_grass_airport,                                  year_start = 1990,                                  year_end = 2019,                                  source = "Blue Grass Airport (Lexington)")

title: c_weather_anomaly — c_weather_anomaly
text: correct, 30 years must selected statistical analysis.

title: c_weather_anomaly — c_weather_anomaly
code: c_weather_anomaly(   data,   year_start,   year_end,   months,   day_start,   day_end,   years,   source,   plot_type = 1 )

title: c_weather_anomaly — c_weather_anomaly
text: data Dataframe columns date, rain, T_air_max T_air_min respectively date day, rain (mm) maximum minimum temperature (°C). year_start Start year begin statical analysis. year_end End year finish statical analysis. months Vector month take account. day_start Start day begin statical analysis. day_end End day finish statical analysis. years vector selection years potential anomaly. Selected years must range years selected year_start year_end. source Source data. plot_type 1 rain ratio mean, 2 rain absolute value

title: c_weather_anomaly — c_weather_anomaly
text: List table diagram. table used build ombrothermic plot.

title: c_weather_anomaly — c_weather_anomaly
code: output <- c_weather_anomaly(data = weather_blue_grass_airport,                             year_start = 1990,                             year_end = 2019,                             months = c(9,10,11,12,1,2,3),                             day_start = 1,                             day_end = 31,                             years = c(2020,2021,2022,2023),                             source = "Blue Grass Airport (Lexington)")

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: lhs value magrittr placeholder. rhs function call using magrittr semantics.

title: t_fahrenheit_celcius — t_fahrenheit_celcius
text: Conversion degree Fahrenheit intp degree celcius vice-versa.

title: t_fahrenheit_celcius — t_fahrenheit_celcius
text: T_air_celcius Air temperature (°C). T_air_fahrenheit Air temperature (°F).

title: t_fahrenheit_celcius — t_fahrenheit_celcius
code: # From fahrenheit to celcius t_fahrenheit_celcius(T_air_fahrenheit = 72) #> [1] 22.22222  # From celcius to fahrenheit t_fahrenheit_celcius(T_air_celcius = 22) #> [1] 71.6

title: weather_blue_grass_airport — weather_blue_grass_airport
text: Observations blue grass airport weather station.

title: weather_blue_grass_airport — weather_blue_grass_airport
text: data frame 45290 rows 9 variables: date Date rain numeric snow numeric T_air_max numeric T_air_min numeric T_air_avg numeric year numeric month numeric day integer
